name: Fall Fruit
description:
Whoooa! What is that pear doing?!

This is a game about a  falling fruit that I have been working on with my buddy Cheese (@supercheeseburger, find his work on Instagram) who has done all the graphics, it's still a work in progress and is intended mainly for android. 

This WebGL version is here for you to try it out on a web browser, let us know what you think!

How to play:

Click on the left area of the game window to go left. 

Click on the right area of the game window to go right.

There will soon be open beta available on Google play.

Cheers!
